TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program - Reach the stars (Cinematic)

Articles.Content: My first KSP cinematic video. Hope you like it! Cried my eyes out until you got it right (mostly)...

Very nice! Some of the camera shots were a bit repetitive, but other than that it was great.

How did you get the camera at all those awesome angles? I'd love to know how to do that.
Kerbcam or something like that is the name of the plug in. A bit messy though, needs some precise work to get the angles right.
